name: Aakash Maindwal Foundation

address: BLOCK- MILANO,MAHAGUN MOSAIC PHASE - II, SECTOR - 4, VAISHALI

briefDescription: Providing Secondary and Sr. Secondary Level Education to Underpriviledged Girls from "National Institute of Open Schooling". A largest open schooling system in the world.Also Providing Computer and Enlish Speaking Teaching to these girl childrens. There are altogether 101 to 103 such girls.
